name: Sam Silverman
description:
I am a first-year Ph.D. student at Boston University in the Shape Lab advised by Prof. Emily Whiting. My primary interests lie in Artificial Intelligence, Computational Fabrication, Human-Computer Interaction, and Robotics.

Previously I obtained my master's degree at Columbia University where I worked with Prof. Brian A. Smith on navigation tools for visually impaired people.

I received my bachelor's degree at the University of Massachusetts Amherst.
